page.description: Hides a window defined by a 'container' control whose sub-type is 'window'. The controls in the 'window' container are the contents of the window.

argument.name: UXContainerWindow
argument.description: name of the container (with sub-type of 'window'.)

page.example: //Code for a button that hides a container window {dialog.Object}.hideContainerWindow('WINDOW1');
